content.en: Wind speed forecasting: Researchers have been exploring ways to improve the accuracy and stability of wind speed forecasting. They have employed various algorithms, such as multi-objective optimization algorithms and neural networks, to optimize the weights and thresholds of forecasting models. By combining data preprocessing techniques, advanced optimization algorithms, and forecasting models, they aim to develop more reliable and accurate wind speed forecasting systems. These efforts involve the use of machine learning and optimization algorithms to enhance the performance of the forecasting models.
content.da: Vindhastighedsprognoser: Forskere har undersøgt måder at forbedre nøjagtigheden og stabiliteten af vindhastighedsprognoser. De har anvendt forskellige algoritmer, såsom multiobjektive optimeringsalgoritmer og neurale netværk, til at optimere vægtene og tærsklerne i prognosemodellerne. Ved at kombinere datapråsseringsteknikker, avancerede optimeringsalgoritmer og prognosemodeller, sigter de mod at udvikle mere pålidelige og præcise vindhastighedsprognosesystemer. Disse bestræbelser indebærer brug af maskinlæring og optimeringsalgoritmer for at forbedre ydeevnen af prognosemodellerne.
